context_of_use: This use case allows customers to add products to their shopping cart in preparation for purchase.
stakeholders_and_interests: customer: wants to purchase multiple items easily
description: This use case enables customers to add products to their shopping cart for a streamlined purchasing process.
triggering_event: Customer decides to add a product to the shopping cart.
preconditions: Customer is logged into the system.
Customer has selected a product to add.
postconditions: The selected product is added to the customer's shopping cart.
assumptions: The customer has a valid account to log in.
The product is available for purchase.
requirements_met: The system shall allow customers to add products to their shopping cart.
main_flow: 1. Customer selects a product → System displays product details.
2. Customer clicks 'Add to Cart' → System adds the product to the shopping cart and confirms the action.
